components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Verizon Network in the U.S. for Small Subset of Phone Numbers via 10DLC

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery to Verizon network in the United States for a small subset of phone numbers via 10DLC.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages to Verizon Network in the United States for a small subset of phone numbers via 10DLC. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages to Verizon Network in the United States for a small subset of phone numbers via 10DLC. incidents.name: Voice Quality Issue Due to High Packet Loss for Calls to Multiple Europe Countries

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing voice quality issues due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple Europe countries. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing voice quality issues due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple Europe countries. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: After monitoring for some time, we started seeing a degradation of the service. We're experiencing voice quality issue due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple Europe countries. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to see recovery for Voice quality issue due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple Europe countries. We will monitor to ensure a full recovery and expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for Voice quality issue due to high packet loss impacting calls to multiple Europe countries. scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance -  Airtel’s Mobile networks in Africa and Asia

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 2 May 2023 at 11:30 PDT until 2 May 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the Airtel’s Mobile networks in Africa and Asia.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 May 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 02 May 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of Short code and Long codes.
Germany
United Kingdom
Mexico
Spain

Azerbaijan Azerfon LLC (Nar Mobile)

Israel Golan Telecom

Uzbekistan UMS Mobiuz

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
12 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
19 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
24 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
26 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
